mapper.insert: insert into orders (order_id, money, paystate, ordertime, user_id, receive_id) value (#{orderId}, #{money}, #{paystate}, #{ordertime}, #{userId}, #{receiveId})

insert into receiveinfo (receive_id, user_id, order_id, receive_name, province, city, add_detail, phonenum, email, payment_method) value (#{receiveId}, #{userId}, #{orderId}, #{receiveName}, #{province}, #{city}, #{addDetail}, #{phonenum}, #{email}, #{paymentMethod})
insert into orderitem (order_id, product_id, buynum) value (#{order.orderId}, #{productId}, #{buynum})
mapper.update: update products set pnum = pnum - #{buynum} where product_id=#{productId}
update orders set paystate = 1 where order_id=#{orderId}
